name: Those Explosive Nights +
description:
Story:

BACK FROM THE DEAD?!?!

-=TNToony N' Mrfun's PartyPlex Wonderland has opened to the public and Is super successful, now are hiring a guard due to reports of animatronics behaving strange and weird noises coming from the place, lots of people Are suspicious and Cross because they think the company, TNT N' Mrfun Entertainment. are hiding something and there has been reports of paranormal activity at night, Local people where mad for a strange smell coming from the cupcake animatronic, The company dont want anymore troubles.=-
